data.name: General
data.descr: Shows all entries for anything not recorded in any of the journals above

data.name: Purchase
data.descr: Record all purchases of inventory on credit

data.name: Sales
data.descr: Where all sales on credit are recorded

data.name: Purchases Returns (PRJ)
data.descr: Shows all returns of inventory that were originally purchased on credit

data.name: Sales Return (SRJ)
data.descr: Where goods that were originally sold have now been returned

data.name: Cash Payments (CPJ)
data.descr: Record all transactions where cash has been paid out

data.name: Cash Receipts (CRJ)
data.descr: Record all cash that has been received
